author: fitz
msg: * subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/lock.c: Remove TODOs that can't be todone
since we don't always have a lock when calling them.  Duh.

author: fitz
msg: Fix get_lock_from_path to conform to its documented API (return NULL
if no lock is found at path).
Implement unlock functionality.  basic_lock test now passes.
Add a few TODOs that I'll fix up in a commit or two.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/lock.c (delete_lock): Pass the lock token to
(get_lock_from_path): New function, containing the former guts of

author: lundblad
msg: Locking branch: Change APIs to reflect latest consensus on how to push
(svn_repos_get_commit_editor): Don't set push_lock_token in editor vtable.

author: sunny256
msg: Get rid of all the line number changes in the Norwegian nb.po file
